name: Deep Dive (s0lly)
description:
Tiny game! A very simple asteroids-type clone set underwater, where a craft sinks to the ocean floor, while mysterious balls of whatever attack it. As the craft sinks, the environment becomes more challenging...

Controls:

WASD = movement

Left Mouse Button = fire bullet towards cursor

ESC = quit

This game was designed and implemented in about 6 hours. My approach here was to try out a few techniques that I've recently learned, in a simple game setting. It was quite an enjoyable process, one that I'll likely do again - albeit with more advanced features!

Requirements:

- Windows, 64bit

- 1080p screen

- OpenGL-capable GFX card
